text: CLOSE A group of NASCAR drivers discuss the accomplishments of Danica Patrick. USA TODAY Sports Chase Elliott ( 9 ), Kasey Kahne ( 95 ) and Danica Patrick ( 7 ) crash during Stage 2 of the 2018 Daytona 500. ( Photo : Mark J. Rebilas, USA TODAY Sports ) Danica Patrick's NASCAR career has officially ended. The racing star, who had announced that the Daytona 500 would be her last career NASCAR race, was caught up in a multi - car crash Sunday at Daytona International Speedway that began near the front of the field far from where Patrick was racing. Chase Elliott tried to make a move on race leader Ryan Blaney during Lap 101 of 200 and triggered a collision that also collected pre - race favorite Brad Keselowski, former Daytona 500 champion Kevin
